cloud_needs.title: Choose the example configuration on which you will base your cloud

help.p1: In this step you will choose the base configuration of your cloud, which you will be able to customize further.
help.p2: This will pre-fill some information in the following steps. You will need to review this pre-filled information carefully to make sure it matches your environment.
help.p3: Hover over or select an example on the left-hand side of this page to find out more about what that configuration provides and its hardware requirements.

warning.title: Replace Configuration
warning.message:
Switching to a new example will result in any previous configuration changes being lost.{{ warnOS() ? " This includes configuration information for servers which have previously had SLES installed." : ''}}

Are you sure you want to replace your existing configuration?
